titleStmt.title: A prospect of the probable benefit and advantage which may be made by the chamber of London in case they should undertake the design of insuring the new-brick buildings from fire, according to the report which will be made by the committee, to whose consideration the same was referred.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: lower margin cripped with loss of imprint date.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
